page.title: 07CHESTERTON SCHOOL
page.content: Various social events take place during the year at Chesterton Primary School when parents and friends are invited.In the Autumn Term children bring garden produce to Harvest Festival.These goods together with a sheaf of corn loaf made in the school are sold for charity funds.Book Week brings authors,publishers and book sellers to a Book Fair at its end,the profits from this going to the school Library fund.Later,at term end, Christmas time means Infant-made cake & tea for Mums & Dads of the younger children.The Nativity Play is always a big draw at this time.Spring term is a quiet time socially but in the Summer term the Fete & Sports days bring many to the School.The year ends with a big Concert as orchestra,choir,guitar, dance and gym clubs perform together in the Hall as Chesterton Entertains.
